articles.author: Brian McGleenon
articles.title: Biden's brutal snub to EU as hopes of Western Alliance crushed - Daily Express
articles.description: JOE Biden's reputation with EU leaders is faltering because of his decision to focus on America's Asian allies with one of the bloc's leading officials warning that the move is 'not good for the West'.

articles.title: WarnerMedia opens new Asian hub in Singapore - BroadcastProME.com
articles.description: WarnerMedia has opened a new regional hub for Asia in Singapore (excluding China and Japan). Officially opened by Singapore’s Minister
articles.content:

articles.title: Exclusive: Shane Pow talks about his drink driving, time in prison and signing with Li Nanxing's agency - AsiaOne
